Django ModelForm Template

Descripción

ModelForm with custom validation


File Template: ✅


Prefix

Scopes

python


Snippet de código

from django import forms
from .models import ${1:ModelName}

class ${1:ModelName}Form(forms.ModelForm):
	class Meta:
		model = ${1:ModelName}
		fields = ['${2:field1}', '${3:field2}']

	def clean_${2:field1}(self):
		data = self.cleaned_data['${2:field1}']
		${4:# Add validation here}
		return data
